wikipedia_page.main: Brennan Price Johnson (born 23 May 2001) is a professional footballer who plays as an attacking midfielder for Nottingham Forest and the Wales national football team.

* Brennan Johnson - footballer, currently plays for Nottingham Forest and Wales National Football Team. Son of former footballer David Johnson.
